import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from "react"; // import { CgMouse } from "react-icons/all"; import "./Home.css"; import ProductCard from "./ProductCard.js"; import MetaData from "../layout/MetaData"; import { clearErrors, getProduct } from "../../actions/productAction"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import Loader from "../layout/Loader/Loader"; import { useAlert } from "react-alert"; const Home = () => { const alert = useAlert(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { loading, error, products } = useSelector((state) => state.products); useEffect(() => { if (error) { alert.error(error); dispatch(clearErrors()); } dispatch(getProduct()); }, [dispatch, error, alert]); const bestseller = document.querySelector('.bestseller'); let screenWidth = window.innerWidth; console.log(screenWidth); if ((screenWidth > 600) && (screenWidth <= 833)) { bestseller.innerHTML = 'BESTSELLERS BESTSELLERS BESTSELLERS'; } else if ((screenWidth > 833) && (screenWidth <= 1200)) { bestseller.innerHTML = 'BESTSELLERS BESTSELLERS BESTSELLERS BESTSELLERS'; } else { bestseller.innerHTML = 'BESTSELLERS BESTSELLERS BESTSELLERS BESTSELLERS BESTSELLERS BESTSELLERS'; } function AutoRefresh(t) { setTimeout("location.reload(true);", t); } return ( {loading ?
